# include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int count[1001];
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	count[0]=0;
	count[1]=1;
	count[2]=1;
	for(int i=3;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		count[i]=0;
		for(int j=1;j<i;j++)
		{
			count[i]=count[i]+count[j]*count[i-j];
			count[i]=count[i]%10000;
		}
	}
	
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<count[n]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
